Text: Hi. Don't bother about resurrecting "Alice 2009 mini series". Don't want to add more to your work. I decided to get it from another source. Thanks anyway.
Thank you my friend you are a ledgend. Another +1 from me and they will keep comming
Thanks 20-40, looking forward to watching this later.

Thanks for all the great stuff you bring us...does your new schedule mean you are no longer doing Justified?  Can I bribe you with homemade brownies or chocolate chip cookies?  Bribes aren't the same as requests:)

@cpsgirl: It sound delicious, any of the things you've mentioned. This morning I was >so< close to do Justified 'cause of missing (late) XviDs for first two eps. Then I saw that both 720p and XviD went public and I backed off... so - IF in the future Scene misses again - you know where to look for... I cannot do better than that.

Well, I still feel you deserve treats for all the stuff you make available:)  I don't really want to post my email on here to get a mailing address to send you anything...is there a private message setup on Pirate Bay?  I haven't really looked into it.  If not, accept some virtual brownies with many thanks:)
